body:
@rsc - I see, but those tests shouldn't even start in this case.
I'm not sure at what branch are you running tests, but the only test that you should be running is:
"should allow starting 30 pods per node"
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/kubemark/run-e2e-tests.sh#L37

I don't know, why other tests are also being started - it seems you are not passing any arguments to:
test/kubemark/run-e2e-tests.sh
